description: Dore ibiganiro tuzumva muri iki cyumweru kuri radio
title: Tuzumva Iki?
content:
Mu kiganiro “Ni Nyampinga” cyo kuwa Gatatu, tuzabagezaho inkuru ya Josiane ukora akazi ko mu rugo kandi akaba abyishimiye. Yemeza ko aka kazi kamufatiye runini, kandi agakora yiteganyiriza. 

Arateganya kuzakomeza kwiga, kandi ni we uzitangira amafaranga y’ishuri. Muri iki kiganiro kandi hazaba harimo ibibazo bya “Tyaza Ubwenge na Ni Nyampinga”, tutibagiwe n’umuziki.

Na ho kuwa Gatanu saa kumi n’ebyeri na 15, mu kiganiro “Ni Nyampinga”, bwo tuzidagadura. Umuziki uzaba ari mwinshi pe! Tuzabasomera ubutumwa butandukanye mwatwoherereje mu gihe k’iminsi mikuru. 

Ku bamaze kubimenyera, mu kiganiro “Ni Nyampinga” murabizi ko twungukiramo byinshi. Kuwa Gatanu tuziga uburyo bategura Tofu. Urayizi? Niba utayizi icyo gihe uzayimenya, hanyuma urenzeho no kumenya kuyitegura. Ntuzacikwe rero! 

Abakunzi ba Knowless namwe ntimuzage kure, kuko muzaboneraho kumva ikiganiro kirambuye yagiranye na “Ni Nyampinga”.

Kuwa Gatandatu saa munani rero, ababa bacikanwe mwese, uyu munsi aba ari umwanya wo kumva ibiganiro byose bya “Ni Nyampinga” byaranze icyumweru. 

Na none kandi Shangazi azasubiza abakunzi bacu baba bamubajije ibibazo ku buzima bw’imyororokere. 

Kuwa Gatandatu “weekend” iba yatangiye. Umuziki uba ari mwinshi.  Tuzanabagezaho kandi igitabo twabasomeye, kirimo inkuru y’umugabo wiyitaga umupasiteri ariko ari umubeshyi ukomeye, maze bikarangira aciriwe urubanza. 

Turi kumwe, kandi turabakunda cyane. 


[Dore amasaha n'amaradio ikiganiro NN kinyuriraho][1]


  [1]: http://rw-gemrwanda.apollo.unicore.io/content/detail/003624ac1c74483caa3df8dc1b3f7aa4/
